com.att.aro.model

Class UserPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.aro.model.UserPreferences

  • public class UserPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to store user preferences for the Data Analyzer, like profile details, visible plots, and the default directory path.

      • getLastProfile

        public java.lang.String getLastProfile()
        Gets either the pre-defined profile name or absolute path to file which contains profile data
        Returns:
        The used profile.

      • getLastProfile

        public java.lang.String getLastProfile(ProfileType profileType)
        Returns either the name or the absolute path to the last used profile of the specified type. If no type is specified, the name or path to the last used profile of any type is returned.
        Parameters:
        profileType - Specifies the profile type to return. If null, the last profile of any type is returned.
        Returns:
        TThe name of the last profile used.

      • setLastProfile

        public void setLastProfile(Profile profile)
        Sets the last profile used to the specified profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile that is to be set as the last profile.

      • getLastProfileDirectory

        public java.io.File getLastProfileDirectory()
        Returns the directory from which the last profile was loaded or saved.
        Returns:
        The last profile directory.

      • setLastProfileDirectory

        public void setLastProfileDirectory(java.io.File profilePath)
        Sets the directory where the user device profiles were last stored.
        Parameters:
        profilePath - The absolute path of the last profile directory.

      • setChartPlotOptions

        public void setChartPlotOptions(java.util.List<ChartPlotOptions> chartPlotOptions)
        Set the list of chart plot options.
        Parameters:
        chartPlotOptions - A List of ChartPlotOptions objects containing the user configurable list of items to plot on the Diagnostic Chart.

      • getChartPlotOptions

        public java.util.List<ChartPlotOptions> getChartPlotOptions()
        Retrieves the chart plot options. The user configurable list of items to plot on the Diagnostic Chart.
        Returns:
        A List of ChartPlotOptions objects containing the information.

      • getLastExportDirectory

        public java.io.File getLastExportDirectory()
        Returns the directory where the last table export occurred
        Returns:
        The last export directory.

      • setLastExportDirectory

        public void setLastExportDirectory(java.io.File f)
        Sets the directory where the last table export occurred
        Parameters:
        f - The last table export directory. If this parameter is a file, the parent directory is used. If it is null, the previous user preference is cleared.
